description: WorkManager chain breaks when one work fails, preventing subsequent work execution.
commonCauses: Dependent work never starts after prerequisite fails
Chain not configured with proper failure policy
Input data not passed between chained workers
Unique work policy causing chain replacement
Retry policy exhausted before chain completion
solutions: Return Result.success() or Result.retry() to continue chain
Use try-catch in doWork() to handle errors gracefully
Pass data between workers with Data.Builder
Implement fallback logic for failed chain steps
prevention: Monitor chain completion rate in production
Implement logging for each chain step
Use unique work names to track chains
examples: override fun doWork(): Result = try { process(); Result.success(outputData) } catch (e: Exception) { Result.retry() }
